Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController

Class GenericController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.GenericController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseGameSceneController, ChooseObjectiveSceneController, EndingSceneController, JoinGameSceneController, LoginSceneController, ManuscriptSceneController, NewGameSceneController, PlaceStarterCardSceneController, StarterSceneController
public abstract class GenericController extends Object
An abstract class representing a generic controller. This class provides methods to handle various actions such as receiving acknowledgments, overwriting chat, handling player reconnections, and suspending the game. All methods in this class are empty and should be overridden in subclasses to provide specific functionality.

      chat - the client chat to be overwritten
      minimodel - the mini model associated with the chat
